mapper.select: SELECT CONTRACT_DETAIL_NO, CONTRACT_NO, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME , UNIT_OF_CONTRACT, DUE_DATE_OF_CONTRACT, CONTRACT_AMOUNT , UNIT_PRICE_OF_CONTRACT, SUM_PRICE_OF_CONTRACT , MPS_APPLY_STATUS, DELIVERY_STATUS, DESCRIPTION,DELIVERY_REMAIN,SLIP_REGIST_STATUS FROM CONTRACT_DETAIL where CONTRACT_NO=#{contractNo}

SELECT CONTRACT_DETAIL_NO, CONTRACT_NO, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME , UNIT_OF_CONTRACT, DUE_DATE_OF_CONTRACT, CONTRACT_AMOUNT , UNIT_PRICE_OF_CONTRACT, SUM_PRICE_OF_CONTRACT , MPS_APPLY_STATUS, DELIVERY_STATUS, DESCRIPTION,DELIVERY_REMAIN,SLIP_REGIST_STATUS FROM CONTRACT_DETAIL

SELECT
CONTRACT_DETAIL_NO, CONTRACT_NO, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME , UNIT_OF_CONTRACT, DUE_DATE_OF_CONTRACT, CONTRACT_AMOUNT , UNIT_PRICE_OF_CONTRACT, SUM_PRICE_OF_CONTRACT , MPS_APPLY_STATUS, DELIVERY_STATUS, DESCRIPTION,DELIVERY_REMAIN,SLIP_REGIST_STATUS FROM CONTRACT_DETAIL
WHERE ('20' || substr(CONTRACT_NO,5,6)) BETWEEN #{value.fromDate} AND #{value.toDate}
WHERE MPS_APPLY_STATUS IS NULL AND DELIVERY_STATUS ='N' OR MPS_APPLY_STATUS='N' AND DELIVERY_STATUS ='N'
DISTINCT D.CONTRACT_NO ,D.ITEM_CODE ,D.ITEM_NAME ,D.UNIT_OF_CONTRACT ,SUM(D.CONTRACT_AMOUNT) OVER(ORDER BY D.ITEM_CODE) AS CONTRACT_AMOUNT ,UNIT_PRICE_OF_CONTRACT ,SUM(D.SUM_PRICE_OF_CONTRACT) OVER(ORDER BY D.ITEM_CODE) AS SUM_PRICE_OF_CONTRACT ,D.MPS_APPLY_STATUS ,D.DELIVERY_STATUS ,D.DESCRIPTION ,D.DELIVERY_REMAIN ,D.SLIP_REGIST_STATUS FROM CONTRACT C,CONTRACT_DETAIL D WHERE C.CONTRACT_NO=D.CONTRACT_NO AND C.CONTRACT_NO IN
(#{item})
ORDER BY D.ITEM_CODE
